column4: hey there I'm having a weird hard disk problem. I am using lvm and one of the disks is throwing SMART errors. The drive is not detected in the BIOS but GRUB still loads from the MBR... seems odd to me.
Are you sure that is the drive grub is installed to?
And the *only* drive grub is installed to?
yea.. it's the only disk in the system right now
